mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO,EMP_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME, J.JOB_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LATE_TB WHERE TAKEN BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{srcDateStart},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{srcDateEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND E.EMP_NO = EMP_NO) late_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LEAVE_TB WHERE TAKEN BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{srcDateStart},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{srcDateEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND E.EMP_NO = EMP_NO) leave_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ABSENT_TB WHERE TAKEN BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{srcDateStart},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{srcDateEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND E.EMP_NO = EMP_NO) absent_count FROM EMP_TB E LEFT JOIN DEPT_TB D USING (DEPT_CD) LEFT JOIN JOB_TB J USING (JOB_CD) WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMP_TB E LEFT JOIN DEPT_TB D USING (DEPT_CD) LEFT JOIN JOB_TB J USING (JOB_CD)
WHERE ${searchBy} IN #{keyword} ORDER BY DEPT_CD

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LOG_TB L LEFT JOIN EMP_TB E USING (EMP_NO) WHERE
TO_CHAR(TAKEN,'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{srcDateStart},'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{srcDateEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD')
TO_CHAR(TAKEN,'YYYY-MM-DD') IN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{srcDateStart},'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND ${searchBy} IN #{keyword}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WORK_TIMES_TB WHERE WORK_DAY BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{srcDateStart},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{srcDateEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY WORK_DAY

SELECT EMP_NO, VCTN_DTL_NO, VCTN_STDT, VCTN_ENDT FROM EMP_TB LEFT JOIN VCTN_HIS_TB USING (EMP_NO) WHERE VCTN_STDT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{srcDateStart},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{srcDateEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}
SELECT * FROM EMP_TB E LEFT JOIN DEPT_TB D USING (DEPT_CD) LEFT JOIN JOB_TB J USING (JOB_CD) WHERE EMP_NO = #{EMP_NO}
SELECT * FROM EMP_TB E LEFT JOIN DEPT_TB D USING (DEPT_CD) LEFT JOIN JOB_TB J USING (JOB_CD) WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMP_TB(EMP_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, EMP_NAME, EMP_RRN_NO, EMP_IMAGE, EMP_ADDRESS, AUTHORITY, ISMANAGER, JOB_CD, DEPT_CD, EMP_EMAIL) VALUES(SEQ_EMP_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{empName}, #{empRRNNo}, #{empImage}, #{empAddress}, #{authority}, #{isManager}, #{jobCd}, #{deptCd}, #{empEmail})
